title: Women's Gloves, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: kid leather
Technique: medallions intaglio printed using colored inks, stripes hand-painted.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Pair of women's long white kid gloves with wavy green lines hand-painted down the length of the arm, at the wrist, a printed interlacing band with flowers, and on the back of each hand a printed medallion.

tombstone.epitaph:
Women's Gloves, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: kid leather
Technique: medallions intaglio printed using colored inks, stripes hand-painted.. Gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1941-86-3-a,b.
